full_title: SONGMICS Dumbbells Set with Storage Stand, 3 Pairs (1kg, 1.5kg, 2kg) Hex Hand Weights with Vinyl Coating & Anti-Roll Design, Compact Home Gym Equipment for Women and Men

reasoning.keyword_integration: Integrated top keywords: 'dumbbells set' (448K), 'dumbbells' (215K), 'weights dumbbells set' (143K), 'dumbbells set women' (94K), 'weight set' (30K). Added 'for women and men' to capture gender-neutral appeal. Used 'home gym equipment' as high-volume category term.
